name: The Flip
summary:

🎮 A super fun zombie shooter - GingasVR

{"height":1402,"type":"image","width":1402}

The Flip is the cooperative VR shooter you’ve been waiting for! Flip City is overrun with the undead and it’s up to intrepid survivors to blast through the hordes. Filled with ravenous nano-tech-infused zombie hordes, jump into...
